description: The James Webb Space Telescope has revealed that galaxies in the early universe were far more chaotic and unstable than once believed. A new study shows that gas turbulence and intense star formation disrupted young galaxies, reshaping scientists’ understanding of how galaxies evolved into the structured systems seen today.
title: James Webb Telescope Finds Early Universe Galaxies Were More Chaotic Than We Thought

description: The discovery of “rotating crystals” marks a major leap in physics and materials research. These unusual solids, composed of spinning particles, behave almost like living systems—twisting, fragmenting, and rebuilding themselves.
title: Physicists Reveal a New Type of Twisting Solid That Behaves Almost Like a Living Material

description: Microsoft introduced multiple new features to Copilot on Thursday. The new features were announced as part of the company’s Fall Update event, and it brings a new character dubbed Mico that gives the chatbot a visual presence. Apart from this, the Redmond-based tech giant is also adding a new Copilot Mode in the Edge browser that bring agentic capabilities to the platform.
title: Microsoft Introduces Major Copilot Upgrade, Brings Avatar, Groups and Health Features

description: APK (Android Package Kit) teardown of the ChatGPT v1.2025.294 reportedly includes code for an upcoming feature that enhances voice conversations by integrating them into the main chat interface. It will reportedly bring new buttons to end the conversation and mute or unmute the microphone.
title: ChatGPT's Voice Mode Could Soon Support Rich Content Including Links, Maps: Report

description: Xbox president Sarah Bond has said that the next Xbox would be a "very premium, very high-end curated experience". In a new interview, the Microsoft excutive discussed the newly launched ROG Xbox Ally handhelds and talked about the next generation of Xbox consoles.
title: Next-Gen Xbox Will Be 'Very Premium, Very High-End Curated Experience', Says Xbox President Sarah Bond

description: Google has reportedly confirmed ongoing GPU driver updates for the Pixel 10 series, but has not promised a major graphics overhaul. The Pixel 10 currently runs Imagination PowerVR driver 24.3, while the newer 25.1 version with Vulkan 1.4 and Android 16 support has yet to arrive. Users report GPU instability, battery drain, and video playback issues, and benchmarks show the Pixel 9 Pro outperforming the Pixel 10 Pro. Despite CPU gains with the Tensor G5, graphics lag behind rivals, and driver updates alone cannot fully fix performance limitations.
title: Google Pixel 10 Series GPU Driver Update Reportedly Confirmed by Company

description: Honor Magic 8 Lite is expected to launch soon as a successor to the Honor Magic 7 Lite. Before the formal reveal, the specifications of the phone have surfaced online. As per the listing, it will have a 6.79-inch AMOLED display with 1.5K resolution. It could run on a Snapdragon chipset and carry a 7,500mAh battery.  It is said to pack a dual rear camera unit.
title: Honor Magic 8 Lite Key Specifications Revealed via Product Listings, Could Launch Soon

description: The Redmi Watch 6 comes with a 2.07-inch AMOLED display, 432×514 resolution, 2000 nits peak brightness, and Always-On Display support. Running Xiaomi Surge OS 3 with the Super Island interface, it supports smart device interconnection, intelligent car control, and app-based messaging, including WeChat quick replies. It offers 150+ sports modes, multi-dimensional health tracking, 5ATM water resistance, dual L1 GNSS antennas, as well as Bluetooth 5.4 and NFC. The watch has a 550mAh battery, linear vibration motor, dual-button design, and weighs 31g with a slim 9.9mm profile.
title: Redmi Watch 6 Launched With 2.07-Inch AMOLED Screen, Up to 24-Day Battery Life: Price, Features

description: The UK’s Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) has issued hundreds of warnings to unregistered crypto exchanges, including HTX, as part of a sweeping crackdown on firms breaching financial regulations. The regulator also initiated legal action against HTX for unlawful promotion of crypto services. The move highlights the UK’s intensified efforts to enforce compliance and protect investors, even as it explores new frameworks for tokenised assets and crypto-linked financial products.
title: UK FCA Cracks Down on Crypto Firms, Hundreds of Exchanges Receive Warnings

description: Apple will reportedly launch its first horizontally folding smartphone with an LTPO+ flexible OLED display in 2026, a tipster revealed in a blog post. On top of this, the company will also unveil the iPhone 18 series next year. However, in the following year, 2027, Apple might unveil the iPhone 20 lineup instead of the iPhone 19 series, to celebrate the 20th anniversary of the iPhone. In 2028, the company might launch its first vertically folding handset, dubbed iPhone Flip.
title: Apple Said to Plan Launch of Foldable iPhone, Bezel-Less iPhone and iPhone Flip

description: Google Photos is reportedly testing an AI-powered feature called Me Meme that can turn selfies into meme-style images. Discovered in an APK teardown of version 7.51.0, it lets users pick a template and photo to create personalised memes. Separately, Google is said to be improving Gemini’s voice input mode, allowing users to lock the microphone for longer, uninterrupted prompts.
title: Google Photos Is Reportedly Working on a Feature That Turns You Into a Meme

description: Hong Kong has approved its first spot Solana ETF, becoming the first Asian market to do so ahead of the US. The ChinaAMC Solana ETF will trade in both Chinese yuan and US dollars, with a minimum investment of about $100 (roughly Rs. 8,800). This builds on prior approvals for Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs, expanding regulated crypto investment options for retail and institutional investors in the region.
title: Hong Kong’s Securities Regulator Approves First Spot Solana ETF

description: Samsung has reportedly delayed the launch of the Galaxy S26 series. However, the possible launch timeline is not yet suggested. The company typically release its Galaxy S trio in January or February each year. This year's lineup is expected to include standard Galaxy S26, Galaxy S26+, and Galaxy S26 Ultra models.
title: Samsung Delays Launch of Flagship Galaxy S26 Series, Tipster Claims

description: Microsoft is set to unveil new Copilot upgrades on Thursday, promising a more personal and interactive AI assistant. Teasers hint at the arrival of avatars, likely featuring “Mico” from GroupMe, along with new agentic browsing features for Edge. The company could also debut Copilot Journeys, group chats, and improved memory tools, further expanding its AI ecosystem across Windows, Office, and the web.
title: Microsoft to Introduce New Copilot Features: From AI Agents to Avatars, Know What to Expect

description: Redmi K90 Pro Max was launched in China on Thursday during the company’s October 2025 event, along with the standard Redmi K90. The Redmi K90 Pro Max is powered by a Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset, paired with a 7,560mAh battery. It also supports 100W wired fast charging. The Redmi K90 and K90 Pro Max sport 6.59-inch and 6.9-inch displays. The standard model boasts a 94 percent screen-to-body ratio. The entire flagship lineup offers a Bose-tuned speaker setup.
title: Redmi K90 Pro Max Launched With Bose Audio, Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 Alongside Redmi K90: Price, Specifications

description: Spotify users have been reporting issues with the app on Android devices in recent weeks. It resulted in the music streaming app frequently crashing or freezing under certain conditions for a sizable number of users, primarily on Samsung and Google Pixel devices, hampering the user experience. The company has now acknowledged the issue and said it is currently under investigation. Spotify says a fix for it is currently in the works.
title: Spotify Acknowledges Issue Causing Frequent App Crashes on Samsung and Pixel Phones

description: Vivo is reportedly gearing up to launch the X300 and X300 Pro in India in the first week of December, according to a tipster. Recently spotted on the BIS and UAE TDRA certification websites, global variants of both models are expected to retain most features from their Chinese counterparts. The Vivo X300 Pro offers a 6.78-inch 120Hz OLED display, Dimensity 9500 chip, and a Zeiss-backed triple camera setup, while the X300 features a smaller 6.31-inch OLED display and identical performance hardware.
title: Vivo X300 Pro, Vivo X300 India Launch Timeline Leaked: Expected Specifications, Features

description: Microsoft has announced the games joining Xbox Game Pass in the latter half of October. The titles coming to the game subscription service include The Outer Worlds 2, PowerWash Simulator 2, Bounty Star, FM 26, and more. The Xbox parent has also confirmed the titles that will leave the service at the end of this month.
title: Xbox Game Pass Wave 2 Titles for October Announced: The Outer Worlds 2, PowerWash Simular 2 and More

description: Garmin has launched its new aviator smartwatches, the D2 Air X15 and D2 Mach 2, aimed at pilots and active users. The D2 Air X15 features a 45mm stainless steel and fibre-reinforced polymer case, while the D2 Mach 2 comes in 47mm and 51mm models with titanium or DLC-coated bezels. Both offer 1.4-inch AMOLED displays, PlaneSync and avionics connectivity, advanced flight data, GPS, health and fitness tracking, and voice commands. Battery life ranges from 10 to 26 days, and prices start at $649.99 (roughly Rs. 57,100).
title: Garmin D2 Air X15, Garmin D2 Mach 2 Launched With PlaneSync Technology, AMOLED Display: Price, Features

description: An APK teardown of the Google app reportedly suggests that Google is developing image markup tools for Gemini. This would allow users to draw on images before entering them to Gemini for more contextual queries. The feature was said to be spotted on the version 16.42.61.sa.arm64 of the Google app. It also said to support the image editing features of Nano Banana.
title: Gemini Markup Tools Spotted in Development With Ability to Highlight Parts of Images

description: OnePlus 15, which is scheduled to launch in China on October 27 as the successor to last year's OnePlus 13, is confirmed to sport a third-generation BOE Flexible Oriental OLED display with 1.5K resolution and up to a 165Hz refresh rate. Its predecessor, however, sports a 2K resolution screen. While the reason behind the move was previously unknown, a company executive has published an explanation on Weibo to highlight why the decision was taken.
title: OnePlus 15 Display Resolution Downgrade Confirmed, Company Explains Technological Limitations

description: EA has detailed Season 1 content for Battlefield 6 with a new trailer. The military shooter will get a new large-scale map, a new multiplayer mode, weapons, and more as part of the first phase of Season 1, which launches October 28. Further updates are planned for November and December.
title: Battlefield 6 Season 1 Gameplay Trailer Details New 'Blackwell Fields' Map and More

description: Bitcoin held near $110,000 (roughly Rs. 96.7 lakh) on Thursday, as the crypto market consolidated amid ongoing US-China trade tensions and the prolonged US government shutdown. Ethereum traded around $3,800 (roughly Rs. 3.3 lakh), mirroring Bitcoin’s quiet momentum. Altcoins such as BNB, XRP, and Solana also traded within tight ranges, while sentiment remained cautious ahead of further macroeconomic clarity.
title: Bitcoin Price Stabilises Around $110,000 Amidst Ongoing Trade Tensions

description: Google has begun selling replacement components for the Pixel Buds 2a and Pixel Buds Pro 2 via its online store. Until now, users with a damaged or lost pair of true wireless earbuds (TWS) have been required to fill out a self-service form on the Google Support page to obtain a replacement. However, this process has now been simplified, with replacement components directly available for purchase via the Google Store website in India, the US, and select other markets.
title: Google Store Now Sells Pixel Buds 2a, Buds Pro 2 Components in India and Other Markets for Easy Replacement

description: iQOO Neo 11, which is set to launch in China on October 30, has been listed on the Geekbench benchmarking platform with a Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC and 16GB of RAM. The phone was running Android 16. The listing suggests what the upcoming handset might offer in terms of performance. It scored 2,936 points in single-core performance and 8,818 points in multi-core performance. The Vivo sub-brand recently revealed that the iQOO Neo 11 will sport a 2K resolution display.
title: iQOO Neo 11 Arrives on Geekbench With Snapdragon 8 Elite Chip, 16 GB of RAM

description: The Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology (MeitY) has proposed new rules for “synthetically generated information,” such as deepfakes, on Wednesday. These have been proposed as an amendment to the IT Rules, 2021, bringing artificial intelligence (AI)-generated content under the purview of the Indian Government and the legal system.
title: MeitY Proposes New Rules to Detect and Track AI-Generated Deepfakes

description: OnePlus could launch a new high-end smartphone by the end of this year. It is expected to run on the Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 chipset and a flat display with a 165Hz refresh rate. The battery capacity of the phone is tipped to be more than 8,000mAh, making it the largest ever in a OnePlus device. Meanwhile, the company is all set to launch the OnePlus 15 and Ace 6 in China on October 27.
title: OnePlus Smartphone With 8,000mAh Battery, Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 Chip Leaked; Could Join OnePlus Ace 6 Series

description: The Oppo Find X9s, expected in 2026 as a successor to the Find X8s, will be a compact “s” variant of the existing Find X9 series. A tipster suggested that the purported handset may feature a 6.3-inch 1.5K LTPS OLED display with symmetrical bezels, an ultrasonic fingerprint sensor, and a triple rear camera system with 50-megapixel primary, ultra-wide, and telephoto lenses. The phone may run on a MediaTek Dimensity 9500+ chipset and house a battery of at least 7,000mAh capacity.
title: Oppo Find X9s Tipped to Launch With 7,000mAh Battery, MediaTek Dimensity 9500+ SoC

description: WhatsApp is reportedly testing a new feature for its Android app, which introduces new filters to simplify content discovery. According to a feature tracker, the Meta-owned instant messaging app is rolling out a redesigned interface to select users, to help them review their photos and videos shared content within a conversation with new filter options. It is also said to allow them to filter stickers for faster search and retrieval.
title: WhatsApp for Android Said to Be Testing a New Feature Which Lets Users Filter Media Files and Stickers

description: Amazon smart glasses for delivery associates with a heads-up display and turn-by-turn navigation support were launched on Wednesday with AI-powered sensing capabilities and computer vision. The US-based tech giant's first smart glasses are claimed to make the delivery experience for agents safer, while offering a hands-free experience. The AI smart glasses also come with a controller, which is worn by agents in a vest.
title: Amazon AI Glasses for Delivery Associates Launched With Heads-Up Display, Navigation: Specifications, Features

description: Over 23,000 people, including Apple co-founder Steve Wozniak, AI pioneers Geoffrey Hinton and Yoshua Bengio, and several global figures, have signed a letter urging a ban on developing artificial general intelligence (AGI) until global safety measures are established. The statement, issued by the Future of Life Institute, warns that unchecked AI progress could threaten freedom, security, and even human survival.
title: Apple Co-Founder and Godfathers of AI Have Signed a Letter Asking for Ban on Superintelligence

description: Oppo A6 4G could launch soon. The details are yet to be officially intimated by the company, but the handset has been spotted on Thailand's National Broadcasting and Telecommunications Commission (NBTC) website. Additionally, the Oppo A6x has reportedly appeared on the SIRIM certification website, effectively confirming its existence.
title: Oppo A6 4G Listed on NBTC Website; Oppo A6x Reportedly Bags SIRIM Certification

description: Reddit has sued AI startup Perplexity and three other firms, accusing them of illegally scraping its data to train Perplexity’s AI search engine. The complaint claims the companies bypassed Reddit’s protections to steal data needed for Perplexity’s “answer engine.” This case joins a growing list of lawsuits by content owners over unauthorised use of copyrighted material to train AI.
title: Reddit Sues Perplexity for Scraping Data to Train AI System

description: Vivo X300 Pro and Vivo X300, launched in China earlier this month, have reportedly appeared on the Bureau of Indian Standards (BIS) website, hinting at an imminent India launch. The listing suggests both models will debut in the country soon. The Indian variants are expected to mirror their Chinese counterparts in most features but may see minor tweaks, particularly in battery capacity, as Chinese OEMs often offer slightly smaller batteries in Indian versions.
title: Vivo X300 Series Surfaces on BIS Website, Could Launch in India Soon

description: The premium segment comprises phones that offer impressive designs, good durability, and capable cameras. While the price tags are higher than those of mid-range devices, these phones typically offer good software support. However, there are times when brands take a few shortcuts to get there. Here’s what you need to know if you're looking for a mobile under Rs. 40,000.
title: Best Mobiles Under Rs. 40,000 in India: From Oppo F31 Pro+, iQOO Neo 10 and More

description: iQOO 15 will launch in India next month with Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset, running on the Android 16-based OriginOS 6. The handset recently debuted in China at a starting price of CNY 4,199 (roughly Rs. 52,000) for the base variant with 12GB RAM + 256GB storage. It is offered in four colourways and a special edition in the country. The flagship handset is expected to be unveiled in India in similar colour options. The Vivo sub-brand has yet to reveal the exact launch date.
title: iQOO 15 Microsite Confirms Availability on Amazon, India Launch Timeline

description: The Redmi K90 and Redmi K90 Pro Max are set to be launched in China today (October 23) as the successor to the Redmi K80 lineup. Ahead of their anticipated debut, the China-based company has revealed a special edition variant of the top-end model in the lineup. Dubbed Redmi K90 Pro Max Champion Edition, the handset will be launched in collaboration with Lamborghini Squadra Corse, the Italian automotive company’s official motorsport department.
title: Redmi K90 Pro Max Champion Edition Teased in Partnership With Lamborghini Squadra Corse

description: OnePlus Ace 6 is expected to go official in China next week and the company has announced key specifications ahead of its anticipated debut. It will sport a 165Hz AMOLED screen and an ultrasonic in-screen fingerprint scanner for biometric security. The upcoming OnePlus Ace 6 will boast quad ingress protection ratings. The handset will pack a mammoth 7,800mAh battery with 120W fast charging support.
title: OnePlus Ace 6 Key Specifications Confirmed Ahead of China Launch; Teased to Pack 7,800mAh Battery, 120W Charging

description: OpenAI’s ChatGPT Atlas is its first AI browser, currently for macOS. It features a minimalist ChatGPT-inspired design, a sidebar AI assistant, and tabs for web, images, videos, and news. The assistant can summarise pages, answer queries, and navigate websites, but limited search depth and GPT-5 rate limits may frustrate users. The browser shows promise, though basic features still need improvement.
title: ChatGPT Atlas AI Browser First Impressions
